channel.title: Help me please i beg of you
channel.description:
OK FIRST OFF IM USING CAMEOLOT PK SOURCE
1. how do i add a door that you can go out and cant come in for 30 sec..? 2. how would i make the quest tab give items? 3. how would i edit the pk points to 2 points a kill please help

item.title: Help me please i beg of you
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

public int variable = int;

Declaration of the variable.

if (variable != int) // Don't let player out or send a message. else // Let the player out.
The if-statement that checks and determines which action to perform.

  1. Add a new case under the switch statement of the button clicking packet. (Not sure which packet that is.)

  2. The client class; just search for -

variable += int;

Edit that to your liking.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me please i beg of you

item.title: Help me please i beg of you
item.dc:creator: @Beastly1 Beastly¿
item.description:
@Beastly1 wrote:

[quote=“dillktm65, post:1, topic:295254”]OK FIRST OFF IM USING CAMEOLOT PK SOURCE

  1. how do i add a door that you can go out and cant come in for 30 sec…?

  2. how would i make the quest tab give items?

  3. how would i edit the pk points to 2 points a kill
    please help[/quote]

  4. You can do that with Timers, and Clickingmost.java/Clicking.java.

  5. You can add commands in there, and make them clickable, and working.

  6. You can do that in Client.java.

Read full topic
